input.sentences: today we brought baby to go visit her grandparents .
mom was very happy to see the baby but grew tired of the crying .
dad was proud to be back home .
here is baby with her aunt jill and uncle tom .
[male] had a long day and was ready for a nap .
output.sentences: The mother and the baby enjoyed a small snack outside.
Grandpa decided to join them while he enjoyed his coffee.
The adults talked about their neighbor who always wore a blue cap.
Afterwards the mother and baby went over to their friend's house.
The babies were very happy to play with one another.
